Software Engineer

Nasdaq OMX, Lakewood, CO
2010 to 2012

  • Lead developer on OATS reporting system using Java and Python.
  • Oversaw two major OATS releases. Supported and maintained OATS reporting during substantial growth.
  • Expanded reporting suite, added new support for a number of Canadian exchanges.
  • Implementation and support of a variety of exchange protocols including: Fix 4.2, Ouch, Rash, Arca Direct 3.2/4.0, DirectEdge, Bats Binary.
  • Developed unit and integration tests, worked with remote support team to deliver excellent service and post production support to customers.
  • Mentored junior developer, allowing immediate contributions.
  • Awarded the Nasdaq OMX Gold CEO Award Q4 2011.
